title: How much are the project components?
body:
So I'm from EUNE and we didn't get it here yet... I'm wondering how much IP or RP each of these components cost in the store :o?

Thanks in advance :)

replies.body:
You can buy 3 icons for 750 IP each. They give you the blueprint to create the first strike borders and 2 project cores each. (you need 7 cores and a blueprint to make the border).

The rest is RP only. So basically the IP icons are for nothing.

You can buy the Champion Skins, Ward Skin and 3 Icons for 5271 RP.

The Project Boxes work like Normal Hextech boxes. They are slightly more expensive than normal hextech boxes HOWEVER have 2 items inside and guarantee 2 Projext Cores to create the borders.
Instead of paying 1950 RP for 10+1 Hextech Boxes. You pay 2950 for 10 Project Boxes + either 1 free box or a Gem.

-----------------------------------
TLDR
 
To gurantee you get all 3 first strike borders, skins and icons, you spend 8220 RP for the Skin + Project Box bundle.

Thanks alot for this :)

PS Is the Disruption icon RP only too? or are there 4 IP icons? o:
the disruption icon wont be released until next week. but looks like yes, it is 1500 IP
